coreAttributes.name: square nipple ring
coreAttributes.description: A pair of metal nipple rings, which are fashioned into a square instead of a more typical circle. To wear them, the bar at the top is removed and slid through a nipple piercing, then the U-shaped part is snapped back into place.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(detach)] the topmost bar from the square nipple rings, before sliding them through [npc.her] nipple piercings and then clipping the U-shaped parts back into place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(detach)] the topmost bar from the square nipple rings, before sliding them through [npc2.namePos] nipple piercings and then clipping the U-shaped parts back into place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(detach)] the topmost bar from the square nipple rings, before sliding them through [npc2.namePos] nipple piercings and then clipping the U-shaped parts back into place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] the U-shaped parts of [npc.her] square nipple rings, before sliding the bars out of [npc.her] nipple piercings and then reassembling the two parts.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] the U-shaped parts of [npc2.namePos] square nipple rings, before sliding the bars out of [npc2.her] nipple piercings and then reassembling the two parts.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unclip)] the U-shaped parts of [npc2.namePos] square nipple rings, before yanking the bars out of [npc2.her] nipple piercings and then reassembling the two parts.
